title: Who Has It?
subtle: Concept (fiction), 25 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR30L
description: In Who Has It? a boy and his friends play with the boy's dog at the park. They pass the dog's toy around, but who has it now? The high-frequency words and simple sentences will support early emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to sequence events as well as to ask and answer questions to better understand the text.
meta: has, have, he, I, she, they, we, who, you
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /h/ sound
Declarative Sentences : Identify and create declarative sentences
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use the high-frequency words has, have, and it

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
